choices: No, I want another type of fantasy world
1.content:
Every great story begins with a first step, but first things first, some rules for the world:

The story takes place in the land of diaphora
It's a magical land full of men, elves and all sorts of mystical races
many kingdoms have risen and fallen over the years, and this world is full of ancient ruins and dungeons
all sorts of magical beasts (classic and brand new) inhabit the world

Do these work, or do you want another type of land?
1.title: Every great story...

11.content: Alright, now that we have our world, who is our hero?
11.title: Yes, let's go

111.content: okay, now are you a boy or girl?
111.title: A brilliant wizard

choices: Nope! You're just a normal wizard
You may have a slight romantic interest in someone in a royal lineage
You have a secret, it's white absorbant crinkly between your legs and wet
1112.content: Alright lady wizard! About to go on a quest, but just a few more questions, first, you wouldn't happen to have any secrets would you?
1112.title: girl

choices: Jax, the son of a despotic king
Scarlet, the free spirited daughter of a strict queen
11122.content: Wizards are rare, so even a new one such as yourself has no doubt been introduced all sorts of kings and queens, but one royal caught your eye, who was it?
11122.title: You may have a slight romantic interest in some...

choices: The lair of an ancient sorceress
A ruined city, consumed by dirt
111222.content: Oh yes, princess scarlet. She's always wanted to go on adventures with you (not that you've had many yourself) but her mother, queen Marilla would never allow it. She's always coddled her only heir and daughter. But perhaps if you could prove yourself a valuable member of court to the queen, she would let you get closer with her daughter. Which is exactly what you're doing today, as today, is your first real quest. The queen has sent you to an ancient dungeon to recover an artifact of great power, but what dungeon is this?
111222.title: Scarlet, the free spirited daughter of a strict...

1112221.content:
Vyrella the cruel was said to have an ancient rod capable of bringing any mortal to submission, and the queen wants you to get it.

You enter the ancient tomb, a door that only your magic could find reveals stone cut square room. With nothing but a door on the far end and a stone table in front of you. The table eminates with magic and a stone inscription in front of it reads
'Enter my tomb if you dare
But be warned
You'll find it hard to cast
When your mind
belongs to me!

I may control you
I may just embarrass you
but only time will tell
if you'll ever find your freedom'

Do you lay your hand on the magic table?
1112221.title: The lair of an ancient sorceress

choices: Yes, and you hear a voice
Yes, and you hear a voice (game route)
11122211.content: You put your hand on the table, and immediately you feel your essence being drained. The table transforms itself, suddenly a bowl of white powder, a cloth and a stack of diapers appear in front of you. In your weakened state, you feel your bladder start to fail as a small stream escapes your body for a split second. It is clear what the tomb wants you to do. Do you put on a diaper?
11122211.title: Yes (optional game route)

choices: A room empty, save for a reflective pool
111222112.content:
Suddenly all around you, the slow seductive voice of a woman speaks out to you. "Hello little wizard. I am the enchantress. In life, I ruled through strength and fear, granting boons to those who served me, and punishing those who resisted. You have entered my lair, and though I no longer live, I will only grant my boons to those who understand the importance of who is in control. If you do as I say, and have the strength to overcome my challenges, you shall be granted great power. Resist me, and you'll find this tomb can be rather unforgiving. Best wishes dear, do me proud." And with that last line, the voice is gone. Suddenly you realize that for the duration of listening, you were fully entranced, and have since padded yourself up on the table with skill you didn't know you had. The padding is thick, forcing you to waddle, but if this is what the enchantress wants, you could get used to it.

Opening the door at the end of the room, you find yourself in...
111222112.title: Yes, and you hear a voice

111222113.content:
Suddenly a voice fills your ears, as if coming from the walls themselves. A strong, sultry voice, of a powerful woman speaks.

"Welcome to my game young one. I am willing to play with you, to see how far you can make it with such limited resources. Let me explain to you, that alter you touched took a great deal of control away from you. But my magic is strong, and for all the more you leak, all the more I'll exert my control onto you. If you fail enough, you will be mine! And be warned, your resources will not last long, you'll need to pace yourself. Good luck!"

The voice vanishes, and once again your body feels weak, this time you just barely resist from losing total control and soiling your robes entirely. You look on the table, only three diapers, and you begin to understand this game of the sorceress' a little bit more.

======================
The game:
In this dungeon, you will need to balance your need to pee, with the dangers of leaking onto the dungeon floor. Choices you make will impact this system.

You have a limited supply of diapers, and you'll need to change accordingly

When your diaper leaks, your soul will fall to the sorceress and you'll be hers

Try to play through the game without backtracking the first time, then explore all the options
====================

Not wanting to wait any longer, you take off your robe to prep for the diapering. You find yourself in the dungeon wearing only
111222113.title: Yes, and you hear a voice (game route)

choices: Enter the next room in only the diaper
1112221132.content:
If ever there was a time for your other, secret to be useful, this was it. You typically scorned your reliance on diapers, but needing them today means you have two more on top of the three you started with.

You quick switch out one of your childish diapers for the first of the far thicker dungeon diapers, and enter the door on the other side of the room.

The room you find yourself in is not what you expected at all.

Hook upon hooks of dresses and robes cover the walls. And in the center, a stone tablet that reads
'It's time to dress appropriately, don't you think?'
Only now do you realise that you forgot your robes in the other room, and stand currently with nothing more than your clean diaper, and your stash of spares.

What outfit do you pick?

bladder pressure: low
Diaper: dry
Stock: 5
1112221132.title: 1st room: wardrobe malfunctions

choices: Ignore the chalice and move for the door
11122211321.content:
You don't know why, but you find yourself drawn to the skimpiest dress you can find. A pink piece of lace that's little more than a bra and some garter stockings. It's the exact opposite of what you would usually wear, but you can't help but picture yourself in front of princess scarlet in it. Before you know it, you're wearing the lingerie, and your focus has been broken to the point that you had begun to use your diaper while you were distracted.

The next room brings quite a puzzle however. In it, sits only a stone table with a chalice of a liquid you can't discern filled to the brim inside of it. The door stands behind the table.

You could cast a spell to evaporate the liquid, but your incontinence always spikes when casting spells, even then, it could be worth it in the face of drinking from the liquid, which it clearly wants you to do.

What do you do?

bladder pressure: low
Diaper: wet
Stock: 5

-added curse: Everything you wear will be magicly turned into a sexier version, and you are permantly slightly aroused
11122211321.title: 2nd room: The cup overfloweth 2

11122211322.content:
Clearly this dungeon is about being willing to baby yourself. At least that's your mentalilty when you go to the pink frilled plastic panties on the far wall. As soon as you touch them you feel your body give way, as your diaper is flooded with an urgency you didn't have before. You look down, and see that your diaper has transformed into a pink frilly cloth backed diaper that is now sagging heavily. Before you enter the first room, you need to decide if it's time to change.

What do you do?

bladder pressure: low
Diaper: soaked
Stock: 5

-added curse: all diapers are now pink, frilled, and less effective
11122211322.title: 2nd room: the cup overfloweth

choices: Ignore the chalice and make for the door
111222113221.content:
You decide not to risk it, and you notice that as you change into the new diaper, it too becomes frilled and pink. After changing you move on

The next room brings quite a puzzle however. In it, sits only a stone table with a chalice of a liquid you can't discern filled to the brim inside of it. The door stands behind the table.

You could cast a spell to evaporate the liquid, but your incontinence always spikes when casting spells, even then, it could be worth it in the face of drinking from the liquid, which it clearly wants you to do.

What do you do?

bladder pressure: low
Diaper: dry
Stock: 4

-added curse: all diapers are now pink, frilled, and less effective
111222113221.title: 2nd room: the cup overfloweth (Dry)

1112221132213.content:
Neither attempting a spell or drinking an unknown liquid while you're in a dungeon trying not to wet yourself seem like particularly attractive options and you opt to simply try for the door.

Stepping past the table you move to open the door, but the moment your hand touches the wooden frame you feel your stomach rubble, and a warm mass start to push it's way into your diaper, forcing the frilly pink undergarment to expand and releasing a foul smell into the room. Only after your body has finished expelling it's waste does the door open.

Before you enter the next room, you must decide whether or not you want to change, your now messy diaper is releasing a foul stench disrupting your concentration and, if you leave it long enough, possibly giving you a diaper rash.

What do you do?

bladder pressure: low
Diaper: messy
Stock: 4

-added curse: all diapers are now pink, frilled, and less effective
1112221132213.title: Ignore the chalice and make for the door

choices: ignore the chalice and make for the door
111222113222.content:
You decide to risk it, and stay in the bulging diaper.

The next room brings quite a puzzle however. In it, sits only a stone table with a chalice of a liquid you can't discern filled to the brim inside of it. The door stands behind the table.

You could cast a spell to evaporate the liquid, but your incontinence always spikes when casting spells, even then, it could be worth it in the face of drinking from the liquid, which it clearly wants you to do.

What do you do?

-added curse: all diapers are now pink, frilled, and less effective
111222113222.title: 2nd room: the cup overfloweth (Soaked)

choices: Ignore the chalice and move for the door
11122211323.content:
It doesn't take a wizard to notice that every thing in that room, from the most simple frock to the sluttiest bra was cursed to high hell, though being one certainly helps. You stride confidently into the next room and feel a pleasant shock in your body as you enter the doorway. Ignoring the arousal it brings on, you know you made the right choice.

The next room brings quite a puzzle however. In it, sits only a stone table with a chalice of a liquid you can't discern filled to the brim inside of it. The door stands behind the table.

You could cast a spell to evaporate the liquid, but your incontinence always spikes when casting spells, even then, it could be worth it in the face of drinking from the liquid, which it clearly wants you to do.

What do you do?

bladder pressure: low
Diaper: dry
Stock: 5

112.content: Ah, a Rogue, masters of stealth and subterfuge, now are you male or female?
112.title: A dashing rogue

choices: No, your as normal as any Rogue.
Your latest quest attire of a diaper and babywear was more then just a cover
You may have some... indiscretions with important people
1122.content: A femme fatale, trained in the art subterfuge and well versed underhanded tactics. Right now you're sitting in a tavern, awaiting payment from your previous quest, but does this particular Rogue have any skeletons in the closet?
1122.title: Female

choices: In a tavern, meeting a contact for a heist
With an adventuring party, listening to a warlock and paladin bicker
11221.content: As far as tales of quick wited, fast talking, faster walking, kelptomaniac, good with a dagger, skullduggerers go, you're about as normal as can be, right now you are at least. But that's something to worry about in the future, right now, you've got something else going on. Where are you on this fine day?
11221.title: No, your as normal as any Rogue.

choices: A kingdom with some very weird customs going on
112213.content: And by that you mean...
112213.title: Somewhere else, somewhere, weirder

choices: Large portions of the population are diapered
One gender is in total control here
1122131.content: Your latest job has taken you to a far off kingdom with one particular cultural quirk that's just about everywhere, it is...
1122131.title: A kingdom with some very weird customs going on

11221312.content: And by large portions, we mean...
11221312.title: Large portions of the population are diapered

choices: A dark skinned human who's always looking out for adventure
A serious elven woman who's all business
112213121.content:
When you first heard from a contact in the underground that the queen of Nivane was holding a gala for all to attend, your first thought was something along the lines of 'what the hell is Nivane?' well after making your way far west to the city of Nivane, you found out it is a very weird place.

Nothing exemplifies it more for you now as you sit in a bar waiting for your contact than the young human waitress making her way over to you. Rather attractive with curly red hair and a curvy figure, she, like every other woman you've seen here, is diapered. Some you've seen wearing pants to cover it, others, like this one, doing nothing to hide their childish faux panties at all, and all of them entirely casual with it. The most straight answer you've gotten from anyone was a shop keeper selling colorful thick diapers on the street, she said that apparently, long ago, an ancient queen was cursed, and now all like her in her kingdom must dress this way, but that's probably just a rumor, and now it's just part of life here.

One last question before the adventure really gets started here, what are you like?
112213121.title: All the ladies

1122131211.content:
As you watched your contact make her way towards you, you felt a certain sense of exhilaration. You always had a sense of adventure, while you certainly did get into some, ah disreputable activities, you wouldn't trade the life of a rogue for anything.

Such a sense of adventure had also given you a flair for experimentation, new methods, new techniques, and new clothing, most pointedly demonstrated by the colorful thick diaper which swaddled your crotch. While normally you wore a pair of green leather pants topped by a blue cloak complimenting your olive skin, the bulk of the diaper had forced you to put the pants aside, leaving you dressed much like your contact in this peculiar land.

Taking a swig of ale, and doing a couple of experimental movements to acclimate yourself to the diaper, you watched your contact sit her crinkly bum down on a neighboring seat.
1122131211.title: A dark skinned human who's always looking o...

choices: room more appropriate for a toddler
11221312111.content:
You took a moment to look over your contact; she was naked from the waist down save for a thick pink diaper, exposing a pair of well-toned legs while her upper body was covered with a white blouse, baring her midriff and teasing her bosoms. She was looking at you expectantly, and so you opted to get down to business.

"So," you said, "give me the rundown on this place."

She looked at you curiously, her face turning into a slight frown. As you were about to get a word in, you found your mouth filled with a rubbery bulbous material — your contacts hand pressing a pacifier in your mouth. "How rude," she said, her accented voice heavy with disappointment. "we'll start again, with proper manners," applying pressure on the pacifier to further emphasize her point.

You smiled behind the pacifier, putting on your most cutesy voice and face. "Wuv couwse, ma'wam, whewe wewe my mannyews."

You watch as her frown quickly recedes, a loving smile in its place. "Now that's more like it," she says, removing the pacifier from your mouth.

"My apologizes again Miss, what's your name, and can I get you anything from the bar? Or do you need a change perhaps, or..." The words come tumbling out in rapid succession, your contact's cheeks turning a slight crimson.

As you pause, it takes your contact a moment to compose herself and respond. "Greetings, my name is Lydia Bergylt, and welcome to Nivane. It's much different, I'm sure, compared to what you're used to, but I think you'll come to like it here," she says as she gestures at your undergarment. "I don't want anything to drink, but if you'll follow me, we can come to discuss the details of your "stay" here.

Finishing you the last of your ale and leaving a few coins as payment, you get up and follow, taking note of the fact that your exchange with the lady had drawn no untoward looks from the rest of the Bar, and catch up to Lydia in a...
11221312111.title: Onto business

112213121112.content:
Taking a moment to admire Lydia's diapered rump, you follow the young lady into what you presume will be your home away from home for the foreseeable future.

Opening up a double door, you find yourself walking into an impressive room. A Queen Sized bed rested in the center, flanked by a sizable dresser and nightstand with the floor covered by a plush rug. A large office space lay just to the right, a desk carved of fine oak, flanked by a pair of windows letting the sun pass through, while a large closet and full-sized mirror took up the rest.

Yet, while you let yourself take in the spacious accommodations, your eyes, long accustomed to quickly evaluating your surroundings, soon began noticing the rooms... unusualness. The comforter on the bed was a bright pink, the dressers candleholders were modeled off of cutesy woodland creatures, matching the stuffed animals resting beside them. Most prominently of all were the thick infantile diapers—far bulkier than the garments swaddling you or Lydia—that were neatly stacked on the nightstand resting beside a rolled-up changing mat.

It was all a lot to take in, and you were only partway through processing it all when you felt Lydia nudge you.

"So, how do you like...
112213121112.title: room more appropriate for a toddler

choices: "Experiment" with your diapers, and enjoy the room's amenities.
Or head out into the streets and explore all the quirks of the locals
1122131211122.content:
"My room?" You repeat dumbly, still transfixed by the place's accommodations.

"Yes, this is where you'll be staying for the duration of your stay here at Nivane. My employer will contact you soon regarding the details of your job at the Gala, but for today, you will be free to explore the sights and amenities our fair land has to offer." Lydia explains, "or you can opt to stay here, there is a sizable book collection, and I'm sure you'll have no trouble getting used to the... "perks" of our undergarments so we'd say."

At that last part, Lydia gives her diaper a few suggestive rubs before turning back on her heels and departing, leaving you with a few options.

Do you...
1122131211122.title: your room?

choices: Your contact, someone you've worked with before
Your contact, a caregiver and sometimes lover
11222.content:
You were currently dressed rather... eccentrically for a rogue, your cloak was still there, but colorful onesie could quite clearly be seen beneath hardly covering a thick diaper. Your hair, while normally cut short, was tied up in a pair of pigtails, and your old necklace was replaced with a pacifier tied around your neck.

There was an explanation, of course, one of your targets had rather peculiar interests and you took advantage of them to "acquire" an item for your client. However, what few knew about you was that you kept stock of similar items in your home, for the few occasions you could stop by and relax.

Ignoring occasional stares you leaned back and downed another shot of alcohol while waiting for...
11222.title: Your latest quest attire of a diaper and babywe...

choices: The child of a king and queen
A simple nobody soon to be thrust into action
115.title: Something else

1151.content:
There are many sorts of prophecies in Diaphora, some big and some small. Each prophecy is told to have change someone's fate or destiny. If ignored though, there would be dire consequences that may impact the person or one's kingdom.

In Diaphora, there are stories in the history where a prophecy ended up coming true and greatly affected the kingdom and one poor prince/princess.

1. Maternal Bonds: In the kingdom of Erag, there is a prophecy that foretells the awakening of a great evil that comes to harm the land. When this evil is awaken, a curse is inflicted on the lineage of the kingdom. One prince/princess shall end up wetting the bed and a queen shall begin producing breast milk without any cause or pregnancy. The queen and child are bonded together and must defeat the evil that has haunted the generations of the kingdom.

2. The Leaking Sword: In the kingdom of Karsa, there lies a sword stuck to a tree and unmovable. It is said that any person who succeeds in removing the sword will unleash the souls of a fallen kingdom who will possess and corrupt the few. Pulling out the sword will also result in the loss of bowels or incontinence of the holder and cannot be lifted until the evil souls are purged.

Well, that doesn't seem worth the trouble, right? Nobody would ever try pulling the sword...unless you are a foolish prince/princess.
1151.title: The child of a king and queen

11512.content:
The kingdom of Karsa stands tall and proud. The current queen of Karsa, Queen Ladra the first, has led her people through war and drought, and now, in the 20th year of her reign, Karsa, both the kingdom and the city for which the kingdom was named, stands in peace and prosperity. This is not to say all is entirely well, more and more, strange ghostly creatures have been springing out of the Karsa wood trees, tall thick trees which are native to the region. Some say this is related to the legend of the leaking sword, an ancient tale of a hero from the royal line, giving up control and dignity to save the realm.

Today you, the child of Queen Ladra, are at the royal grove, where the oldest known Karsa tree stands. It is here that your ancestor Karsei the shameless, banished a great evil and locked your family into this legend, or so they say. All that stands know is a rotted old tree with an ancient blade sticking out of it, no ones ever pulled it out and theres no way that'll change today. But first, are you a prince, or a princess?
11512.title: The Leaking Sword

choices: Quiet and demure, and studying simple magics
You're not a princess, you're an orphan who grew up with no mom!
115122.content: Ah, young princess, and what are you like?
115122.title: Princess

choices: Some guards come through, accompinying the queen
1151223.content:
Yes, you've never actually known either of your parents, you grew up on the streets of Karsa, stealing what you needed to get by. Today is one of those days, while also being your 18th birthday. You've never had time to celebrate that and you won't start now. No, instead its the first day of the royal harvest, when the queen's grove is picked of it's fruits and berries to be given out to the people, well most of the people anyway. Streetrats like yourself make due.

You hope the fence to the grove, despite being royal grounds, the guards here as lazy as all hells, so sneaking in is no big deal. Darting from place to place, you carefully avoid the occasional guard that strolls through the lawn. As you sneak through the place, you find a rather odd sight, a rotted old tree with a sword sticking out of it, and a pond surrounding the tree, save for a walkway. You check yourself out as you begin to approach this tree, your dark pants and tunic look more like they should be for a man, but your at home stitching skills have been useful in accentuating your womanly aspects. Your breasts are large and your black hair is wavy, but you've always thought your real treasure lies behind you. It's not an easy life having to squeeze your toned rear into your pants everyday, but checking yourself out in the water, you make it work.

Moving past the water, your eyes lock on this old sword. Despite being clearly aged, it still looks incredibly sharp. Despite the intimidating appearance, a pink bow hangs off the hilt, and you feel weirdly compelled to grab it. You've never been a swords girl before, but you can't resist a sudden urge to hop the pond, grab the hilt, and pull! The sword comes out with almost no effort at all, but suddenly before your vary eyes, out of the same hole the sword had made, a ghostly woman begins to appear. You see her only for a second, long flowing hair, an incorporeal lower half, and large free waving breasts on her chest. She gives you a silent smirk, points a long well manicured finger, and disappears.

Before you can even reconcile with what happened, you feel a growing warmth between your legs, looking down, you've clearly wet yourself so much that a small puddle of your shame is pooling under your leg.

It's at that moment...
1151223.title: You're not a princess, you're an orphan...

choices: alea investigates the castle, looking for the court sorceress
11512232.content:
Alea, the orphan in question, was shocked. She hadn't wet herself since she was a toddler. She was a full grown woman now, not some little kid. But her shock increased when her clothes changed. Her dark pants disappeared, replaced by a very large diaper. It was a baby's diaper, scaled up to fit her womanly waist, while her tunic turned from the dark green hand sown object into a pastel green toddlers dress that would only look good an a toddler. Her normally bare feet were clad in baby booties and her wavy hair was in pigtails. As a final insult came as a pacifier popped itself into her mouth and she unconsciously started to suck it.

What Alea didn't know was the history of the evil the sword had sealed away. A long time ago there was a royal line of an evil kingdom that sought to conquer the kingdom that existed before Karsa. To solve this problem, the queen of this nameless land cast a spell upon the women of this evil line, cursing them to act infantile and need diapers, which were provided by the curse. For 100 generations this worked, until a particularly powerful evil queen cast a spell meant to cause the women of this kingdom to wet there panties, to make then understand her pain. Her anger caused her family curse to merge with the spell, creating a ghostly entity known as The Nanny. The Nanny then went on a rampage, turning every woman in the good kingdom into an adult baby. It was only when Karsei the shameless, a former maid, took the curse into herself and bound The Nanny into the first Karsa tree. But as another hundred generations passed, The Nanny gained power, as shown by the ghostly creatures coming from the trees. Alea would be the first of the new royal line, saving the kingdom of Karsa (formed from the ancient rival kingdoms) from the pampered fate that The Nanny would bring. Alea, as the chosen one, retained some mental maturity. While some others might retain maturity, it was doubtful.

Alea realized she wasn't the only one effected when a female guard crawled up to her and cooed up at her. In the distance Alea could hear adult women making baby sounds, babbling, cooing, wailing and everything else.

-----

do we check in on the effected or do we follow Alea as she searches the castle for the court sorceress, hoping she can help.
11512232.title: Your attire changes drastically

1153.content: There has been a general dnd theme so far, let's keep that up with
1153.title: Some other person

11533.content: going down the class list
11533.title: Another choice

115333.content: Should we keep on doing dnd inspired options?
115333.title: more options

info.brief_description: You are the hero of classic wizards and knights style fantasy, with one embarrassing twist
info.description:
Take the place of a fantasy hero (or villain!) in the fantasy land of Diaphora. But be warned! Heroes in this land often find themselves prone to embarrassing and messy situations!

Rules:
18+ content is allowed
Try not to rip off existing fantasies (If the world is an entirely original one, don't throw in Gandalf the wizard or anything like that)
Add where you want!
